name: Sadly
description:
Sadly is a unicorn that has been cursed! You need to guide them to a rare mystical flower that has the power to uplift the curse and return Sadly to his glorious state.

But, the path ahead is tough and fraught with peril, will you persevere and keep HOPE or will you quit??

Sadly's fate is in your hands!

Xbox 360 Controls:

Movement: D-pad/left joystick

Jump: A button

Menu item click: A button

Menu item select: Dpad

Leave game and go back to main menu: Back button

Keyboard:

Movement: Left/Right arrow keys

Jump: Space bar

Menu item click: Space bar

Menu item select: Up/Down arrow keys

Leave game and go back to main menu: Escape button

Sadly is our GCC Game Jam 2015 entry. It has won a runner up prize and we couldn’t be any happier :D

The game jam’s theme was Hope

Our team was made up of me, my twin sister Fatima and our friend Eman Naser.
